name: m_u_s_e_u_m (Demo)
description:
One time I had a dream about walking around an infinite museum. This is what this game is about.

This demo was made for AGDG Demo Day 26.

What's missing:

-All music

-Most SFX

-Almost all the art (there's only 2 sculptures)

-Variety in levels (there's only 7 as of now)

-The entire "time" system (that's what the clock at the start will be for)

I really hope nothing's broken, but you never know.
